article.title: Scope and Methods of the Statistical Reporting Service
article.text:
MethodsReportingScopeServiceStatistical

Scope and Methods of the Statistical Reporting Service

(d) On deliveries to sidings used exclusively by certain firms or individuals \u003cbr\u003e\nlocated on said sidings, and where consignees or consignors refuse to pay, or \u003cbr\u003e\nunnecessarily defer settlement of bills for \u003cb\u003ecar service\u003c/b\u003e charges, the agent will \u003cbr\u003e\ndecline to ...
